subject: Baseball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Rich “Goose” Gossage, who finished his career in 1994 with a 124-107 record, 1,502 strikeouts and 3.01 E.R.A. in 1,002 games, was among those inducted on Sunday.
snippet: Rich “Goose” Gossage, who finished his career in 1994 with a 124-107 record, 1,502 strikeouts and 3.01 E.R.A. in 1,002 games, was among those inducted on Sunday.
